generated_body: If you click on the article titled "What Happens When a Plane Collides with a Flock of Birds?", you can expect an informative exploration of bird strikes in aviation. The article is likely to discuss the mechanics of such collisions, including the potential damage to aircraft and the safety protocols in place to mitigate risks. It may also cover statistics on the frequency of bird strikes and their impact on flight operations. Additionally, the piece could delve into how wildlife management practices at airports aim to reduce the likelihood of these incidents.
